cli.epilog:
Integrated Usage Examples:
    # One-click start production mode (without SearXNG)
    aiforge-docker start

    # One-click start production mode (with SearXNG)
    aiforge-docker start --searxng

    # One-click start development mode (code hot reload, with SearXNG)
    aiforge-docker start --dev --searxng

    # Stop all services
    aiforge-docker stop

    # View service status
    aiforge-docker status

    # Clean Docker resources
    aiforge-docker cleanup

    # Deep clean resources
    aiforge-docker deep-cleanup

Development Version Usage Examples:
    # Use startup script (recommended)
    ./aiforge-docker.sh start --dev
    ./aiforge-docker.sh deep-cleanup

Language Settings:
    # Dynamically specify language via environment variables
    AIFORGE_LOCALE=en ./aiforge-docker.sh start
    AIFORGE_LOCALE=ja ./aiforge-docker.sh status
    
    # Windows PowerShell
    $env:AIFORGE_LOCALE="en"; ./aiforge-docker.bat start

Features:
    âœ… Auto-detect Docker environment
    âœ… Smart image building (avoid duplicate builds)
    âœ… Real-time build progress
    âœ… Optional SearXNG enablement
    âœ… Service health checks
    âœ… One-click resource cleanup
    âœ… Multi-language support (zh|en|ar|de|es|fr|hi|ja|ko|pt|ru|vi)
